titleStmt.title: The Strange and wonderful history of Mother Shipton plainly setting forth her prodigious birth, life, death, and burial, with an exact collection of all her famous prophecys, more compleat than ever yet before published, and large explanations, shewing how they have all along been fulfilled to this very year.

The Strange and wonderful history of Mother Shipton plainly setting forth her prodigious birth, life, death, and burial, with an exact collection of all her famous prophecys, more compleat than ever yet before published, and large explanations, shewing how they have all along been fulfilled to this very year.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed for W.H. and sold by J. Conyers,

notesStmt.note: Imperfect: cropped, stained and tightly bound, with loss of text.
Item at reel 1986:6 incorrectly identified as Wing (2nd ed.) E3627B.
Reproduction of original in Magdalene College (University of Cambridge) Library.
